rows.label: tlk45320392_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Three months ago, there was
an explosive accident caused
by the Divine Beast weapon.

rows.label: tlk45320392_01_msg0002
rows.name:
According to the testimony
of the surviving workers,
the cause was human error.

rows.label: tlk45320392_01_msg0003
rows.name:
Some fool tried to operate the system
without following the procedures, and
handled the Beast fluid incorrectly.

rows.label: tlk45320392_01_msg0004
rows.name:
Moral is, even when we think we
have this great weapon under control,
we don't really understand it.

rows.label: tlk45320392_01_msg0005
rows.name:
Whoever built this thing
is probably laughing at us
from beyond the grave.
